Package edu.cwru.sepia.environment.model.state

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDDistributer
    An interface describing the ability to issue unique identification numbers to targets (units or resource nodes) and templates The State class is intended to be the primary implementer of this.
    StateCreator  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LoadingStateCreator  
    PlayerState  
    RawStateCreator
    A core component of simulating.
    ResourceNode
    A subtype of Target that contains all information of a resource.
    ResourceNode.ResourceView  
    State
    Represents the state
    State.StateBuilder  
    State.StateView  
    Target
    An class that signifies that an extending class can be the direct object of an action This requires that they all share an ID scheme
    Template<T>
    Signifies that an implementing class provides generic details about a specific object.
    Template.TemplateView  
    Unit  
    Unit.UnitView  
    UnitTemplate
    Contains information shared between units of the same type.
    UnitTemplate.UnitTemplateView
    An immutable representation of a UnitTemplate.
    Upgrade
    An instance of an upgrade template.
    UpgradeTemplate  
    UpgradeTemplate.UpgradeTemplateView  
    XmlStateCreator  
    XmlStateUtil  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ResourceNode.Type  
    ResourceType
    An enumeration of two types of reserces, i.e., Gold and Wood.
